e="preserve">Raúl Alfonso Allain Vega (1989 in Lima) is a Peruvian writer, poet, editor and sociologist.
About.
Allain is the author of "La cientificidad del consciente: Conjeturas" (2011) and various texts that have been published in Latin American media. His texts have been published in the anthologies "Abofeteando a un cadáver" (2007), "Poesía y narrativa hispanoamericana actual" (2010), "Veinte poetas: muestra de poesía contemporánea" (2010), "Antología décimo aniversario de Lord Byron Ediciones" (2013), "El Papa Francisco en el Perú / Versos y prosa" (2018), "Antología de poetas críticos" (2019), among others.
As an editor, Allain has published anthologies on poetics, visual arts, and journalism "Poéticas: selección de artes poéticas por poetas peruanos contemporáneos" (2010), "Suicidas Sub 21" (2010), "Convergencias: muestra de poesía contemporánea" (2011), "Poiesis hispanoamericana: selección de poesía contemporánea" (2012), "Eros & Tánatos: poesía y arte contemporáneos" (2012), "¡Yo no hice nada!: sobre la idiosincrasia peruana" (2013), "¡Palaciego In Memoriam!: selección de textos de Humberto Pinedo" (2018), among others.
In December 2013, the proclamation of the scientific variables it raises is seen in the article "La educación peruana: una gran estafa" by the historian, poet and journalist Humberto Pinedo.
In November 2016, 'Análisis de Humberto Pinedo sobre la obra reciente de Raúl Allain' is published. He is a columnist for the newspaper "Expreso", the "Lima Gris" magazine and "Ssociólogos", a Spanish news outlet and sociology. His articles published in his column Maquinaciones are taken by various means.
In July 2019 he received the "World Award for Cultural Excellence" from the Hispanomundial Union of Writers (UHE). He subsequently received the "International Eagle World Award for Sociological Excellence".
